Name: Midnight Moon
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: A slightly sweet bubbly crowd pleaser of a cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Colin Peter Field, Hemingway Bar, Ritz Paris, France.
Garnish: Half apple slice to represent a crescent moon & orange zest twist (discarded).
